Date: 2025-01-14 11:44
Subject: Insurance required / Personal Shipment - Mr. Patrick Chalhoub //  VILLA CHALHOUB: GLAS ITALIA - Details of the forwarder // INV# 25V2000039
--------------------------------------------------
Dear @Hagop Ghazarian <mailto:Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com> 

Good Morning,

 

Trust you’re doing well

 

We have another shipment ready for collection tomm for Mr. Patrick Personal shipment from Italy to UAE 

MOT – To be advised

Forwarder: AA&S shipping. 

 

Could you please support us to insure the items for the invoice attached / subject shipment 

 

Looking forward to your response 

 

Thanks & Regards

GEETA MANJAL​​​​

SENIOR COORDINATOR ‑ SHIPPING

REAL FZE

DUBAI

‑

UNITED ARAB EMIRATES
